name: 廖思涵
objective: WELCOME TO INTERMEDIATE CHINESE! Intermediate Chinese is designed to consolidate the foundations built in Basic Chinese and continue developing students' skills in aural comprehension, speaking, reading, and writing. While all four skills are emphasized, primary attention will be given to listening and speaking, since a solid foundation in these two skills is vital to the development of reading and writing skills. Upon completion of the course, you should be able to speak Chinese with some fluency on everyday topics and be able to write short compositions on simple everyday life topics. We not only educate you to compare Chinese culture with your own culture, but also immerse you in a Chinese cultural environment and provide you with the communicative tools you need in order to act appropriately in Chinese culture.
